    • Constructor Detail

      • Camera

        public Camera(org.newdawn.slick.GameContainer gc,
      Map map)
        Create a new camera
        Parameters:
        gc - the GameContainer, used for getting the size of the GameCanvas
        map - the current map

    • Method Detail

      • centerOn

        public void centerOn(float x,
            float y)
        "locks" the camera on the given coordinates. The camera tries to keep the location in it's center.
        Parameters:
        x - the real x-coordinate (in pixel) which should be centered on the screen
        y - the real y-coordinate (in pixel) which should be centered on the screen

      • centerOn

        public void centerOn(Player player)
        Centers the camera on the player.
        Parameters:
        player - the player

      • drawMap

        public void drawMap()
        Has to be called before Camera.translateGraphics() ! Draws the part of the map which is currently focussed by the camera on the screen

      • drawForeground

        public void drawForeground()
        Draws the Foreground of the map. The layer named "foreground" will be rendered.

      • translateGraphics

        public void translateGraphics(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
        Translates the Graphics-context to the coordinates of the map everything can now be drawn with map coordinates.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics context

      • untranslateGraphics

        public void untranslateGraphics(org.newdawn.slick.Graphics g)
        Reverses the Graphics-translation of Camera.translatesGraphics(). Call this before drawing Menu and HUD text.
        Parameters:
        g - Graphics context
